sections.title: Role & Project Context
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's responsibilities and involvement in Aegis IAM operations
sample_questions: Can you describe your primary responsibilities within the Aegis IAM project?
How does your role interface with the Platform and Security departments?
Which runbooks or RFCs do you most frequently reference in your day-to-day work?

sections.title: Security Controls & Policies
sections.goal: Explore application of company security policies, especially POL-SEC-001
sample_questions: How do you ensure compliance with the 'Least Privilege & JIT Access' policy in Aegis IAM?
Can you walk me through a recent example where you had to adjust RBAC roles to meet policy?
What tooling or automation supports your enforcement of access controls?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbooks
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee handles security incidents and leverages documented procedures
sample_questions: Tell me about a time you had to use RB-IAM-075 'Access Revocation Emergency'.
How do you coordinate with SRE during an IAM-related outage?
What are the key signals you monitor to detect compromised credentials?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify and discuss dependencies between Aegis IAM and other Novereon Systems projects
sample_questions: Which other projects rely on Aegis IAM for authentication or authorization?
Have you encountered any integration issues with Orion Edge Gateway or Poseidon Networking?
How do you manage changes that could impact dependent services' SLAs?

sections.title: Risk Assessment & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Probe how the interviewee evaluates security risks and balances them against operational constraints
sample_questions: Describe a decision where you had to balance security hardening with user experience.
How do you document and communicate residual risks after mitigation?
Can you give an example where evidence from an audit (e.g., AUD-24-Q2) influenced a trade-off decision?

sections.title: Future Improvements & Lessons Learned
sections.goal: Gather insights into potential improvements and reflections from past challenges
sample_questions: What enhancements to Aegis IAM security controls are on your roadmap?
Which lessons from past incidents have led to lasting changes?
How do you measure the effectiveness of security training for operational teams?
